about_the_game:
This DLC contain a new Nano-plugin :

Companion Turret

A Moving turret that follow their owner and shoot enemy at sight. Turret got 4 type of stats depends on Nano-plugin rarity.
A weak broken turret only use Glock pistol firepower with weak armor.
A standard turret type is using Mp5 smg firepower.
Rare turret is using P90.
The legendary status turret is using F2000 riffle specification with better armor

Downside, turret will shoot everything/everyone when its HP is almost destroy.

!INSTRUCTION HOW TO GET THE COMPANION TURRET NANOPLUGIN!

Companion Turret Nano-plugin is obtainable / drop from any source that have it (Ammo box / Dead Enemies / etc)
